remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 当您对同一类型的对象具有多个时, 您需要提供自己的逻辑, 以便基于每个数据对象的属性来选择要应用的。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意, 如果您具有不同类型的对象, 则可以在上设置属性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果这样做, 则无需创建。If you do that then there is no need to create a . 此外, 如果您的对象具有相同类型但具有不同的属性, 则还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建模板选择器, 请创建一个继承自的类, 并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后, 可以将类的实例分配给元素的模板选择器属性。Once your class is defined you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. ## Examples 在此示例中, 绑定源是`Task`对象的列表。In this example, the binding source is a list of `Task` objects. `Task`对象的属性之一是`Priority`。One of the properties of a `Task` object is `Priority`. 定义了两个数据模板: `myTaskTemplate`和`importantTaskTemplate`。There are two data templates defined, `myTaskTemplate` and `importantTaskTemplate`. 若要根据数据对象的 `Priority`值提供要选择使用的逻辑 , 请创建的子类, 并重写方法。To supply logic to choose which to use based on the `Priority` value of the data object, create a subclass of and override the method. 在下面的示例中, 方法提供了逻辑以根据`Priority`属性的值返回相应的模板。In the following example, the method provides logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `Priority` property. 在封装元素的资源中找到要返回的模板。The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping element. [!code-csharp[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTSClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/TaskListDataTemplateSelector.cs#dtsclass)] [!code-vb[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTSClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/visualbasic/tasklistdatatemplateselector.vb#dtsclass)] 然后，我们可以将 `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` 声明为资源：We can then declare the `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` as a resource: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTS](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#dts)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 若要使用模板选择器资源, 请将其分配给的属性。To use the template selector resource, assign it to the property of the . 对于基础集合中的每个项,调用的方法。 `TaskListDataTemplateSelector`The calls the method of the `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` for each of the items in the underlying collection. 该调用会将数据对象作为项参数传递。The call passes the data object as the item parameter. 方法返回的将应用于该数据对象。The that is returned by the method is then applied to that data object.
